ygData.subject: Re: Stats for a char
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, I haven t played since the expansion due to video problems with my Savage S3 video card. Sony says they are working the problem and will keep me
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, I haven't played since the
expansion due to video problems with my Savage S3 video
card. Sony says they are working the problem and will
keep me updated, but, since I haven't heard from them
in 2 months I think my current video card is a lost
cause. In any case when I fork over the money for a new
video card you can find me on Xegony Server with the
following:<br><br>Euradite Level 51 Wizard (Wizzkid)<br>Ishkar Level 35
Shamman (Reptilious)<br>Barbarian Level 18 Warrior
(Crimsonsword)<br>Gnome? Level 7 Chanter (Mindmold)<br>High Elf Level 6
Cleric (Eyeheal)<br>and last, and certainly
least....hehe<br>Elfish? Level 1 Ranger (Arrowmatic)<br><br>Hope to see
anyone around that is on Xegony.
